name: Shovel Runner
description:
Shovel knight slept to much around its firecamp and forget to extinguish it in time. Help him to run and save his life from the flames !

Write in the comments the maximum distance you achieved to run  and the the amount of gems you collected !

Small game I made with unity as a prototype of and endless runner. Don't hesitate to give your feedbacks !

Updates to follow !


This game is not affiliated with Yacht club games

Left- right arrows : Run

Down arrow : down thrust when jumping

Space : Jump

A : Attack

R : Restart level when dead

Assets :

Art : Yacht club Games

SoundTrack : Francesco Fabrizio, Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi)

SFX : Jessica Robo
